item.title: Decorators
item.description: Introduction Before looking into Decorators, we need to know key points about Functions in Python. Functions are Objects. Means they can be referenced, passed as an argument, can be returned as well. Decorators dynamically alter the functionality of a function, method, or class without having to directly use subclasses or change the source code of the function being decorated Implementaion Function as a Decorator Boilerplate Code: import functools def decorator(func): @functools.
